Plant a tree every time you shop online with Kernel! 

Continue to shop online at your beloved retailers and for each purchase Kernel will plant to tree on your behalf to ensure you are doing your bit for the environment.

Did you know every 1 second the size of a football field is demolished by deforestation? 

Kernel is here to fight climate change by allowing you to contribute with small actions making huge impacts. Before every purchase at a Kernel partnered store, you will prompted to activate "Tree Planting" on each purchase you make. Just one click and any purchase you make in the next 24 hours will plant a tree - it's that easy!
